TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClientOperation extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClientOperation extends System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperationCompatBase
Public NotInheritable Class ClientOperation Inherits ClientOperationCompatBase

summary.span: 用于在客户端对象或客户端通道对象中修改或扩展特定协定操作的执行行为。

span.span: Used to modify or extend the execution behavior of a specific contract operation in a client object or client channel object.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是仅一个服务操作范围内的自定义扩展的客户端运行时修改和插入点的位置。The class is the location for client run-time modifications and insertion point for custom extensions that are scoped to only one service operation. (修改协定中所有消息的客户端运行时行为，请使用 类。(To modify client run-time behavior for all messages in a contract, use the class. )) 使用类型为 （来查找要修改的特定操作）或类型为 （然后可以通过创建自定义属性来应用）的自定义客户端行为对象来安装 修改。Install modifications using a custom client behavior object, either of type (to find a particular operation to modify) or of type (which can then be applied by creating a custom attribute). 使用 属性可以查找表示特定服务操作的 对象。Use the property to locate the object that represents a particular service operation. 有关客户端和客户端体系结构的详细信息，请参阅 [使用 Wcf 客户端](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/accessing-services-using-a-client) 和 [Wcf 客户端体系结构](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/client-architecture)访问服务。For more information about clients and the client architecture, see [Accessing Services Using a WCF Client](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/accessing-services-using-a-client) and [WCF Client Architecture](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/client-architecture). 有关自定义客户端运行时的详细信息，请参阅 [扩展客户端](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/extending-clients)。For more information about customizing the client runtime, see [Extending Clients](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/extending-clients). 有关使用行为的详细信息，请参阅使用 [行为配置和扩展运行时](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/configuring-and-extending-the-runtime-with-behaviors)。For more information about using behaviors, see [Configuring and Extending the Runtime with Behaviors](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/configuring-and-extending-the-runtime-with-behaviors). 您可以使用下面的属性来插入自定义对象或修改客户端执行行为：The following properties enable you to insert custom objects or modify the client execution behavior: - 使用 属性插入某一操作的自定义 实现或修改当前格式化程序。Use the property to insert a custom implementation for an operation or modify the current formatter. - 使用 属性插入自定义 实现或修改当前实现。Use the property to insert a custom implementation or to modify the current one. - 使用 属性来控制谁可以序列化出站消息。Use the property to control who serializes an outbound message. - 使用 属性来控制谁可以反序列化入站消息。Use the property to control who deserializes an inbound message. - 使用 属性来访问请求消息的 WS-Addressing 操作，以及使用 属性来访问响应消息操作。Use the property to access the WS-Addressing action of the request message and the property to access the response message action. - 使用 和 来指定哪些客户端方法与异步操作相关联。Use the and to specify which client methods are associated with an asynchronous operation. - 使用 属性来获取指定类型的集合，这些类型可以在 SOAP 错误中显示为详细类型。Use the property to get a collection of specified types that can appear in SOAP faults as the detail type. - 使用 和 属性分别控制当调用操作时会话是已启动还是被撤销。Use the and properties to control whether a session is initiated or is torn down, respectively, when the operation is called. - 使用 属性来控制在完成调用前客户端是否等待响应。Use the property to control whether the client waits for a response before completing the invocation. - 使用 属性获取包含 对象。Use the property to obtain the containing object. - 使用 属性获取操作的名称。Use the property to get the name of the operation. - 使用 属性控制将哪个方法映射到操作。Use the property to control which method is mapped to the operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 将自定义参数检查器插入到 属性中的每个 中。The following code example shows an inserting a custom parameter inspector into each in the property. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以控制格式化程序是否反序列化从入站消息返回的值，或者是否将入站消息作为返回值直接返回。Use the property to control whether the formatter deserializes the return value from an inbound message or whether the inbound message is returned directly as the return value. - **注意** 如果为 `false` ，则返回类型必须为类型 ，并且不能有 out 参数或 在运行时引发。**Note** If `false`, the return type must be of type and there can be no out parameters or an is thrown at run-time. 如果消息为 `null`，则在运行时引发 。If the message is `null`, a is thrown at run-time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性插入某一操作的自定义 实现或修改当前格式化程序。Use the property to insert a custom implementation for an operation or modify the current formatter. 格式化程序的使用可以由 和 属性来控制。The use of the formatter can be controlled by the and properties. 接口定义 和 方法，它们分别用于将对象参数的集合转换为消息，以及将消息转换为返回值的集合。The interface defines the and methods, which are used to convert a set of object parameters to a message and from a message to a set of return values, respectively.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的集合，这些对象可以检查和修改特定的客户端方法的入站和出站对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of objects that can inspect and modify inbound and outbound objects for a particular client method.

value.span: 实现的集合。

span.span: A collection of implementations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性插入自定义 实现或修改当前实现。Use the property to insert a custom implementation or to modify the current one. 对于请求，参数检查器是按它们添加到集合的顺序来调用的；对于回复，则按相反的顺序调用。Parameter inspectors are invoked in the order in which they are added to the collection for requests and in the reverse order for replies. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 将自定义参数检查器插入到 属性中的每个 中。The following code example shows an inserting a custom parameter inspector into each in the property. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 对象是否序列化出站消息。

value.span: 如果 属性将返回值序列化为回复消息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property serializes the return values into a reply message; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指示格式化程序是否将操作参数序列化为回复消息，或者确定是否将第一个参数作为出站消息发送。Use the property to indicate whether the formatter serializes operation parameters into a reply message or to determine if the first parameter is sent as the outbound message. > [!NOTE] > 如果设置为 `false`，则该操作必须有且只有一个 类型的参数，否则将引发异常。If set to `false`, the operation must have exactly one parameter of type or an exception is thrown.
